scripts.view:json: npm run invoke:json && npm run logs:json && npm run tail:json
scripts.view:text: npm run invoke:text && npm run logs:text && npm run tail:text
scripts.invoke:json: aws lambda invoke --profile developerPlayground --region eu-west-1 --no-cli-pager --function-name json-format-function response-json-format-function.json
scripts.invoke:text: aws lambda invoke --profile developerPlayground --region eu-west-1 --no-cli-pager --function-name text-format-function response-text-format-function.json
scripts.logs:text: devx-logs --space developer-playground --column message --column status --column app --app text-format-function
scripts.logs:json: devx-logs --space developer-playground --column message --column status --column app --app json-format-function
